text: Gu Fhe Bakɨme gum Krais Zisas, ana zumgum za kha vhɨzgi gumgi gu mbigi, gum kha ŋamki gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga suaŋv mbe suanga guma, gu mani nɨman kama havharar khaŋ ndu nzuai. Krais Zisas, ana za kha gumgi gu mbigi nɨman kɨrar hɨgɨp, ana zazera mbara muuŋgip kɨv, ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan kɨrga.
